      25             : struct ServoUnsafeCell {
      26             :   T value;
      27             :

      56             : // Indicates whether the Servo style system should perform normal processing or

      58             : // which is what's required when handling frame reconstruction.  The change
      59             : // hints in this case are unneeded, since the old frames have already been
      60             : // destroyed.
      61             : enum class TraversalRestyleBehavior {

      63             :   ForReconstruct,

      73             : 
      74             : // The mode to use when parsing lengths.
      75             : enum class LengthParsingMode {
      76             :   // In CSS, lengths must have units, except for zero values, where the unit can
      77             :   // be omitted.
      78             :   // https://www.w3.org/TR/css3-values/#lengths
      79             :   Default,
      80             :   // In SVG, a coordinate or length value without a unit identifier (e.g., "25")
      81             :   // is assumed to be in user units (px).
      82             :   // https://www.w3.org/TR/SVG/coords.html#Units
